issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: *Assessment* When using ec2-import-instance (EC2 API Tools version 1.7.0.2 2014-05-01) against a Eucalyptus 4.0, the following error is seen: {code} # ec2-import-instance saucy-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw -t m3.medium -f RAW -a x86_64 -b saucy-server-imported-20140609 -o AKI6GWITDEHGJIEBTREA -w X6iF2kYYZ4jQxfO8p5Zsgb7j4G6aVF8CluvAdj6G -O AKI6GWITDEHGJIEBTREA -W X6iF2kYYZ4jQxfO8p5Zsgb7j4G6aVF8CluvAdj6G -p Linux --url http://compute.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --region eucalyptus Requesting volume size: 3 GB ERROR: Unable to create signed manifest URL. Cannot access/create bucket: saucy-server-imported-20140609 : AmazonS3Exception: Status Code: 403, AWS Service: Amazon S3, AWS Request ID: 59572ABB38BEDE1C, AWS Error Code: InvalidAccessKeyId, AWS Error Message: The AWS Access Key Id you provided does not exist in our records., S3 Extended Request ID: RO3EOCA10CRzsbhwpkDl0JRK/iNp9yZ+EqNWJEPLSnXWgQ7PE9ptWZcbBZvV/3xs {code} *Signs* * ec2-import-instance with --verbose and --debug flags: {code} [root@odc-f-13 ~]# ec2-import-instance saucy-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw -t m3.medium -f RAW -a x86_64 -b saucy-server-imported-20140609 -o AKI6GWITDEHGJIEBTREA -w X6iF2kYYZ4jQxfO8p5Zsgb7j4G6aVF8CluvAdj6G -O AKI6GWITDEHGJIEBTREA -W X6iF2kYYZ4jQxfO8p5Zsgb7j4G6aVF8CluvAdj6G -p Linux --url http://compute.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --region eucalyptus --debug --verbose Setting User-Agent to [ec2-api-tools 1.7.0.2] Using AWS acces key: AKI6GWITDEHGJIEBTREA Requesting volume size: 3 GB 2014-06-09 17:34:03,527 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - >> "GET /?max-keys=0 HTTP/1.1[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,529 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - >> "Host: saucy-server-imported-20140609.s3.amazonaws.com[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,529 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - >> "Authorization: AWS AKI6GWITDEHGJIEBTREA:iDQK9At0pPINNyDFOPZD1JCgO2A=[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,529 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - >> "Date: Tue, 10 Jun 2014 00:34:02 GMT[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,529 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - >> "User-Agent: aws-sdk-java/unknown-version Linux/2.6.32-431.17.1.el6.x86_64 OpenJDK_64-Bit_Server_VM/24.51-b03[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,529 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - >> "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,530 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - >> "Connection: Keep-Alive[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,530 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - >> "[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,559 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - << "HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,561 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - << "x-amz-request-id: B4A9823A8492A50F[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,561 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - << "x-amz-id-2: Z80GtTo/z5m3Q939sy4EtAHsjVKST/NYZ/thQQOz/i/spKVYtR+ZdQDTxv1iAoOg[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,561 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - << "Content-Type: application/xml[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,561 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - << "Transfer-Encoding: chunked[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,561 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - << "Date: Tue, 10 Jun 2014 00:34:03 GMT[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,561 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - << "Server: AmazonS3[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,561 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - << "[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,673 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - << "156[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,673 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - << "[\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,673 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - << "InvalidAccessKeyIdThe AWS Access Key Id you provided does not exist in our records.B4A9823A8492A50FZ80GtTo/z5m3Q939sy4EtAHsjVKST/NYZ/thQQOz/i/spKVYtR+ZdQDTxv1iAoOgAKI6GWITDEHGJIEBTREA" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,713 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - << "[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,714 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - << "0[\r][\n]" 2014-06-09 17:34:03,714 [main] DEBUG org.apache.http.wire - << "[\r][\n]" ERROR: Unable to create signed manifest URL. Cannot access/create bucket: saucy-server-imported-20140609 : AmazonS3Exception: Status Code: 403, AWS Service: Amazon S3, AWS Request ID: B4A9823A8492A50F, AWS Error Code: InvalidAccessKeyId, AWS Error Message: The AWS Access Key Id you provided does not exist in our records., S3 Extended Request ID: Z80GtTo/z5m3Q939sy4EtAHsjVKST/NYZ/thQQOz/i/spKVYtR+ZdQDTxv1iAoOg com.amazon.aes.webservices.client.cmd.GeneralError: ERROR: Unable to create signed manifest URL. Cannot access/create bucket: saucy-server-imported-20140609 : AmazonS3Exception: Status Code: 403, AWS Service: Amazon S3, AWS Request ID: B4A9823A8492A50F, AWS Error Code: InvalidAccessKeyId, AWS Error Message: The AWS Access Key Id you provided does not exist in our records., S3 Extended Request ID: Z80GtTo/z5m3Q939sy4EtAHsjVKST/NYZ/thQQOz/i/spKVYtR+ZdQDTxv1iAoOg at com.amazon.aes.webservices.client.cmd.CreateConversionTask.createSignedManifestUrl(CreateConversionTask.java:235) at com.amazon.aes.webservices.client.cmd.ImportInstance.invokeOnline(ImportInstance.java:257) at com.amazon.aes.webservices.client.cmd.BaseCmd.invoke(BaseCmd.java:1128) at com.amazon.aes.webservices.client.cmd.ImportInstance.main(ImportInstance.java:296) {code}
fields.environment:

** 1 x CLC
** 1 x UFS, Walrus
** 1 x UFS
** 1 x CC, SC (managed mode)
** 2 x NC

comments.body:
There may not yet be a way to configure the S3 endpoint to use with the ec2-import-instance command:

https://forums.aws.amazon.com/thread.jspa?messageID=475568&tstart=0
This is a tools issue and Amazon would have to modify the tool to work
